Below is an basic grouping of data visualization techniques.  If the below does not have what you're looking for, then the next best place to look is here: https://www.rstudio.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/ggplot2-cheatsheet.pdf 

Start here: http://r4ds.had.co.nz/data-visualisation.html 

Make sure to read this about creating themes and templates: http://moderngraphics11.pbworks.com/f/ggplot2-Book09hWickham.pdf 

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

mpg_data<- ggplot2::mpg
```
